title: How Young People in Zarqa Spend their Evenings
summary: The graph depicts a number of ways Young People Zarqa Spend Evenings People in Young People Zarqa Spend Evenings Spend_Time_With_Family their Young People Zarqa Spend Evenings , as a percentage of those asked .
The most popular chose is Reading_a_Book a , done by 38 percentage of Young People Zarqa Spend Evenings People .
gold: This chart shows that the majority of people in Zarqa prefer reading a book in an evening . Although this would suggest they may prefer solitude , interestingly , they do not like watching TV with only 12 % stating that as their chosen way to pass the time .
